Name: Relic Keepers
About the game: Sworn as a protector of the realm, your duty is protect a powerful relic hidden away in a small outpost. Suddenly, you hear a war horn as monsters rush in to attack the villagers and lay claim to the relic. Armed with your battle hardened sword, defend the villages and protect the relic against these vile intruders. Relic keeper is an action game set in a fantasy setting. Helped by the village guards, keep the artefact safely inside the village walls and try to outlast against waves of evil creatures. Features An action game mixed with base defence gameplay. Adapt yourself to different settings (Village, Desert Camp) Battle hordes of vicious enemies Defend your honor as you protect an important relic that will change the world Visit multiple worlds and protect them from the horrors that infest them
